description: This API provides access to earnings reports for companies listed on Nasdaq.

methods.name: getEarningsByDate
methods.description: Retrieve all companies that posted earnings on a specific date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve earnings reports, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for paginated results.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results per page.

returns.description: A list of companies with their earnings report details.
